question: What is written on an election ballot?
possible_answers: A. The names of the candidates in your election district
B. Who you should vote for
C. The date and time you are allowed to vote
main_question: What is written on an election ballot?
answer: A. The names of the candidates in your election district
explanatory_sentence: Marking the ballot: Mark an "X" in the circle next to the name of the candidate of your choice.
